title: Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas

sources.title: Enchanted (1997) When a love guru can't fix his own heart
sources.description:
A self-help guru for everyone else, but clueless about his own life ‚Äì can David untangle his heart before love slips away?
David Russell dishes out spot-on advice to friends about careers and romance, yet fumbles his own Hollywood dreams and feelings for Natalie Ross. When his best friend Allen starts pursuing Natalie, David must confront his fears or lose his chance at happiness.

Original Title: Enchanted (1998) | AKA: Go West

‚≠êÔ∏è STARRING
John Ward (David Russell)
Sydney Penny (Natalie Ross)
David Kaufman (Allen Stinner)
Jaid Barrymore (Ms. Robbins)
George Anthony Baker (Andre Barnes)
Michael Beaumont (Frank, The Guardian Angel)

üé¨ CREW CREDITS
Directed and Written by John Ward
Cinematography by Joe D'Alessandro 
Music by Chris Houston 

üéØ WHY WATCH?
BOLD THEME: Quirky 90s indie charm meets romantic comedy chaos!
Genre-defining tropes: Wisecracking guardian angels & workplace crushes!
Hidden-gem appeal: Pre-digital era indie with heart and humor!
Cult curiosity: John Ward's passion project brimming with earnest energy! ‚ú®

metadata.Plot: Belle prepares the castle for Christmas against Beast's wishes, trying to bring him happiness for the season. Forte, a pipe organ, fears that Belle's plans may eventually bring about an end to the curse... the curse that brought him more importance in the Master's life. Forte uses Fife, a flute who desperately wants a solo, to destroy Belle's plans and get rid of her.
metadata.Writer: Flip Kobler, Cindy Marcus, Bill Motz, Bob Roth, Carter Crocker, Karl Geurs
metadata.Actors: Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jerry Orbach, David Ogden Stiers
